channel.title: QA/Programming Portfolio on Randy Griffin
channel.description: Recent content in QA/Programming Portfolio on Randy Griffin

item.title: UI Automation
item.description: Developed a hybrid test framework using Selenium and Java for browser automation Increased Java End-To-End test code coverage to 80% Performed Regression testing after releasing new features Created automated script for REST API testing using Rest Assured framework. Tracked and reported bugs using Jira Link to Github Repository

item.title: Mobile app testing using Appium
item.description: Developed automated test scripts to simulate the interactions of multiple users within a software application Performed accessibility testing for Android and iOS applications as per American Disability Act. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Stock Screener
item.description: Created a tool that allows the user to enter stock tickers and retrieve the latest data from yahoo finance. Stocks can be filtered by moving average, P/E ratio, and more. Currently in beta, and will be updated with new features in the future. Link to Github Repository

item.title: About
item.description: Programming and Software testing are my passions. My name is Randy Griffin and I am pursing a career in Software Testing or related fields. I am graduating from Columbus State University this year with a degree in Computer Science. I have always enjoyed testing different software and technology ever since taking a QA course in school. Within the next few years, I will have the knowledge to be successful in my field and teach others all about Quality Assurance.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Follow me on these social media platforms. Platform URL LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/randy-j-griffin/ GitHub: https://github.com/RandyGriffin Twitter: https://twitter.com/TechandStocks
